headline: Synchrony and Polaris Renew Consumer Financing Partnership to Offer Flexible Payment Options for Powersports Customers
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a leading consumer financing company, today announced it has renewed its financing partnership with Polaris Inc. (NYSE: PII), a leading manufacturer of off-road vehicles, including Sportsman all-terrain vehicles and the Polaris RANGER, RZR, XPEDITION, and GENERAL side-by-side vehicles, as well as snowmobiles and Slingshot vehicles.

headline: CareCredit Software Integrations And New Bond Issuance Could Be A Game Changer For Synchrony Financial (SYF)
summary: In February 2026, Weave and Planet DDS each announced new integrations of Synchrony Financial’s CareCredit solution into their practice management platforms, while Synchrony also completed a US$750 million fixed-to-floating senior unsecured notes offering due in 2032. Together, these healthcare financing integrations and fresh bond funding highlight Synchrony’s push to deepen its role in medical and dental payments while strengthening its funding base. Next, we’ll examine how embedding...

headline: A Look At Synchrony Financial (SYF) Valuation After Recent Share Price Pullback
summary: Why Synchrony Financial is on investors' radar today Synchrony Financial (SYF) has drawn fresh attention as investors reassess its recent trading performance, with the stock’s one-month and three-month returns being weighed against its longer term track record. See our latest analysis for Synchrony Financial. The recent 2.7% 1-day share price return to US$70.77 comes after weaker momentum over the past month and quarter, while the 1-year and multi year total shareholder returns remain firmly...
